name: 401kFundAdvice
overview:
401kFundAdvice.com is an online financial advisory service.

We are a small, yet powerful online investment advisory service, offering investment advice on virutally any type of brokerage account.

Chief Financial Advisor and Certified Public Accountant Jeff Fountain founded the company in January of 2010.

With a focus on personal service in a sometimes sterile web-based world, 401kFundAdvice tries hard to make clients feel as connected and appreciated as possible.
